name: MacBook Air 13″ (M4)
notes: Up to 18h video; supports up to two external displays.

name: MacBook Air 15″ (M4)
notes: Up to 18h video; supports up to two external displays.

name: MacBook Pro 14″ (M4 Pro or M4 Max)
notes: M4 Pro: up to 14h web; M4 Max: up to 13h web; weight ~1.60–1.62 kg.

name: MacBook Pro 16″ (M4 Pro or M4 Max)
notes: M4 Pro: up to 17h web; M4 Max: up to 14h web; weight ~2.14–2.15 kg.

name: Mac mini (M4 or M4 Pro)
notes: M4: up to 2TB storage; M4 Pro: up to 8TB; M4 Pro base memory 24GB.

name: Mac Studio (M4 Max or M3 Ultra)
notes: M4 Max: up to 8TB; M3 Ultra: up to 16TB; base M3 Ultra memory 96GB.

name: Mac Pro (M2 Ultra)
notes: Tower. Expansion via PCIe; ports vary by chassis.
